data.title: More Fun than You Can Believe
data.text:
Three of us rented Pedegos from Bob Bibee at Pedego Irvine.  Bob was super friendly, relaxed but efficient in getting us out the door and on our way.  The bikes were in like new condition and easy to ride.

I liked my ride so much I bought a bike from Bob who again couldn't have been more helpful in deciding which model would fit my needs best. I can't recommend both his rental business and bike sales highly enough.

data.title: Excellent, Fun, Easy
data.text:
We rented electric bikes.  What a blast.  Easy to ride like a regular bike.  The bike store is on a bike trail.  An easy bike trail ride down to Balboa Island.  

You can and likely will pedal as you ride.

Helmets are included.

This is fun.  The bikes are fast if you want to go fast.  And the batteries last a long time.  The bikes can easily go 25 to 30 miles.

Give this a try.
